title: Migrate to V2 registry architecture with lazy discovery
description: Replace 'one MCP tool per subagent' with registry-based lazy discovery to support 50-100+ subagents without context pollution. Implements capsule-based search, latency tiers, and multi-host awareness per oracle recommendation.
notes: Core implementation complete. Remaining: E2E testing (subagent-10) and cleanup of duplicates
